"It was really strange," Wilshere said to Sky Sports.

"I got to the game and walked up the tunnel and thought, 'Where do I go first? Do I go and talk to the Bournemouth boys?' That felt right because they're my team at the moment.

"It wouldn't be right if I ignored all of them and went in and said hello to the Arsenal boys. Of course, I spoke to them after the game but it didn't feel right before the game.

"I said to one of the staff before the game, 'I feel awkward here'. It was the same when I was watching the game.

"Danny Welbeck kept asking me, 'Who do you want to win?' It was a strange one. I've never been in that situation before."

He continued: "At the moment, my head is in Bournemouth. I know as much as everyone else knows.

"I read what the boss at Arsenal said and at the moment I'm focused on performing for Bournemouth and putting myself in a position where Arsenal want to offer me a new contract and I'm in a strong position at the end of the season.

"At the moment, I'm taking each game as it comes, working hard and I'm looking forward to the next six or seven months here at Bournemouth.

"We'll see what happens after that."

Wilshere is trying to eliminate the previous two seasons – where he made just one top-flight start from a total of just five league appearances – from his mind.

"Let's forget the last two years," added Wilshere.

"Two years of injuries, of coming back, of trying to get fit and not getting in the team and then picking up another injury and missing too much football.

"Let's just erase the last two years and start again.

on the game…

It’s not only a disappointing night because we are out, but it’s a disappointing night because the performance was disappointing. I question our urgency level, our focus from the start on. It was not good enough and we paid for that. Overall, I think that is the most disappointing. It can happen that you go out of the competition, but our first 45 minutes were just not good enough and not at the level of required concentration. In the second half we responded well, but overall for me, that’s the most disappointing.

on what he said at half-time…

That what we did there was not Arsenal. It’s not the way you can stay in the competition and that we want a different response. I think it was there, but overall it’s a disappointing night and I must say, Southampton deserved to qualify and well done to them. They were ready from the start on and we were not.

on whether it was a learning experience…

It is a learning experience but it’s still disappointing. People will say I made many, many changes. But look at the names of the players who were on the pitch tonight. We had plenty of Premier League games on the pitch.
on whether the squad was strong enough squad to win the competition…
Yes, I felt we had a squad that could win it. We had the luck to play at home. It’s disappointing to have a crowd like we have, you can give them some satisfaction in this competition as well and the way we started the game, I think it’s disappointing.

on losing the 19-game unbeaten run…

I don’t think I can moan about the momentum in the Premier League, that is important for us. I knew that in the League Cup that could happen, but it’s disappointing to lose the game more than the run we have. The run we want to keep in the Premier League, but I am very disappointed tonight because there are questions on important things. You know, when you turn up in the first 45 minutes we played.

on Elneny…

It’s sickness only, it’s not an injury.

【信報財經新聞】英國BBC報道，內地房地產商人和集團行政總裁戴永革及其姊、集團非執行董事戴秀麗，有意入主英冠球會雷丁。目前，雷丁班主為一個泰國財團。
報道表示，戴氏姊弟已與該泰國財團展開談判，有望兩周內達成協議。

雷丁班主亦計劃出售主場米底捷斯基球場、球隊及訓練場，但會保留球場周邊土地及酒店擁有權。

戴氏姊弟此前試圖收購英超球隊侯城，但因戴永革不諳英語，未能通過英格蘭足總個人測試而未獲成功

Dan Crowley’s loan spell at Oxford United has been cut short by the League One club.

The promising midfielder joined them during the summer on a season long deal, but it seems something has gone wrong somewhere and the 19 year old has been sent back to London.

Quoted by the BBC, Oxford manager Michael Appleton hinted that there might be a behind the scenes issue at play, saying, “I’m certainly not going to lose sleep if Arsenal have got an issue with Oxford United going forward.

“The one thing we are, and will always be, is very professional. Nothing and nobody will ever get in the way of what we’re trying to do from a team culture and ethos point of view.”

Crowley has made 11 appearances for Oxford this season, scoring three goals and picking up two yellow cards.

It’s also the second season in a row where a loan deal involving Crowley has been terminated early. Last year he was due to spend 6 months at Barnsley, but returned to Arsenal in October without any real information being given as to why.

It will certainly raise questions about the temperament of a very talented player, but one who does seem to have issues fitting in.

皇天擊殺林早洩😄

接手高登CEO至今已經有八年，一開始知道要代表高登出席唔同場合，都擔心會俾人起底，但最後決定豁出去以真面目示人。記得上任唔夠一年，就遇到高登歷年o黎最嚴重o既事件 — — 被告誹謗。最初我以為對方只係「嚇o下大家」，殊不知官司一打就打o左五年，最後打到上終審法院至告一段落。當時所受o既壓力大到難以形容，幸好得到好多會員o既支持，甚至有會員自發希望o係財政上給予支持，至今我仍然非常感激。不過，就呢單訴訟我o地花費o左超過7位數字o既律師費同賠償，換o黎法律上清晰釐定討論區要為會員發言負上o既責任。

除o左經常要處理關於誹謗問題o既律師信，高登最常要面對o既就係網絡攻擊問題。其實我o地一直有為伺服器作軟硬件上o既更新，奈何網絡攻擊o既「攻勢」日益增強同頻密，唔少時候大家鬧緊我o地Server超慢，背後其實都係因為伺服器受緊唔同程度o既攻擊，唔單只程式員要用大部分時間o黎處理相關問題，我自己有時都要半夜起身，甚至身處外地時都要處理。面對呢o的攻擊，我覺得冇可能每次都同大家講，否則有o的敏感時間每日要出十次八次公告，大家可能睇到麻木。

其實早年外界對高登有好大誤解，傳媒每每提到高登，差不多一定會同「網絡欺凌」、「閃卡」同「粗口」扯上關係，我覺得既然自己出得o黎見人，不如以高登CEO o既身份向外界宣傳大家o係本地創意文化o既貢獻。雖然初期因為經常出席公開場合影相而被改圖，但近幾年外界對高登o既感覺大有改善，一直以o黎大家o既努力總算冇白費。

以上種種，我希望維持到一個畀大家可以暢所欲言o既討論區，但卻忽略o左最根本o既問題，討論區o係使用體驗上未能與時並進，忽略o左一班手機App用家，在此我希望可以向一眾手機App用家致深切歉意。

因為自己並非「高登仔」，之前一直沿用前管理人對所有事實或非事實o既指控都唔回應o既作風，認為同大家保持一定o既距離，避免言論偏幫任何一方，令處事更加中立。不過呢種諗法已經過時，未能接收到大家o既諗法，做出最合大家心意o既決定。所以我決定以後同高登討論區相關o既重大決定，都會先發帖諮詢各會員o既意見。

近日我已經請程式員加快改善兩個手機App及Mobile版網頁表現，盡快推出新版本，方便習慣用手機上高登o既朋友使用。往後我o地將會就各人o既意見不斷進行修改，請大家到時畀多o的意見我o地。最後我想再向一眾會員再次致歉，感謝各位一直以o黎對我o地o既支持。

SANTI CAZORLA TO UNDERGO SURGERY

Santi Cazorla is travelling to Sweden early next week to undergo surgery to his right ankle.
The club’s medical team and specialists have decided that surgery is required to the plantaris tendon in the Spain international's right foot.

The problem has not progressed during a rehabilitation programme following the injury during the home match with Ludogorets on October 19.

We expect Santi’s full recovery to take approximately three months.

Everyone at the club will be working hard with Santi to make sure he’s back on the pitch as soon as possible.

[GUEST][PLKLFC][長文慎入] 本人為保良局屬下中學學生。

呢個所謂「紀律訓練營」跟本就係一個on_白痴兼浪費錢嘅活動。 首先，你入到去郁唔郁就會俾人鬧，俾人體罰。係罰你企係一個叫「廢人池」嘅池入面。根本就係侮辱我地學生嘅尊嚴。呢件事已經上過報紙，俾人鬧爆。

另外，跪係班老師前面竟然係一個常規活動。係，多謝老師係應該嘅，但係唔係用呢個搞到學生好似低等生物咁方法黎「多謝」囉。 最後，呢個營係班制，一個人做錯全班一齊罰，咁只會令到一啲能力冇咁高嘅同學俾人排擠，跟本做唔到「團結一致」嘅效果，反而適得其反。

所以我認為呢個不受歡迎，臭名昭著嘅「紀律訓練營」係一個不必要多餘嘅活動，而應該取消。

補充：體罰已經觸犯香港法例 公民權利及自由 第37A條 不受酷刑或其他形式的殘忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或處罰的權利 已經定罪，最高可判處10年監禁。
